Label_AddByNameInstruction:
To add a process, enter its name without the ".exe" extension at the end.
To add multiple processes, enter their names separated by /
Label_HotkeyInstruction: Press and release the desired key
Label_Work:
The program is running!
Press [KEY] to change the volume.
Press [KEY] to exit.
Message_EmptyList: The focused program list is empty!
Message_EmptyMixer: No processes found in the mixer!
Message_SimilarHotkeys: The volume change key and exit key cannot be the same!
Tooltip_Blacklist: In blacklist mode, volume will only change for processes in the focused programs list.
Tooltip_Whitelist: In whitelist mode, volume will change for all processes except those in the focused programs list.
Tooltip_Volume: The volume level to set for processes in the focused programs list.
Tooltip_MuteHotkey: The key that activates volume change when pressed.
Tooltip_ExitHotkey: The key that stops the program when pressed.
Tooltip_IndicationVolume: The volume level for sounds indicating activation or deactivation of volume change.
